players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Bob, I'm concerned about your silence last night. What do you know?"
You: "Charlie, I'm not sure what you're insinuating, but I didn't know anything about Alice's death."
Diana: "I know Alice is dead, but I didn't do it. I want to keep the mafioso's identity a secret."
You: "Charlie, I think we should focus on finding the mafioso instead of accusing each other. We have two villagers left and one detective to help us make a decision."
Charlie: "Bob, I think we should investigate Diana more thoroughly. They've been acting suspiciously and haven't given us any useful information so far."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie

players.name: Charlie
